altername_name: Econo Kids: Ta ga Tame ni Kane wa Naru
name: Econo Kids: Ta ga Tame ni Kane ha Naru
overview: Eko no Kids - Taga tame hi kane ha naru is a 2d board game that features 5 characters to choose from and 3 different stages to play. The game takes place in a fantasy world and the player can compete againts one character (human or computer one) or up to 3 different characters. The game features different events that will make the player's money increase or decrease and there are also shops to buy items to help him win the match.
